about_the_game:
I’ve always loved monster tamer games, but I never have enough free time to capture and level up all the weird & unique monsters I want to try.

So I decided to make a game where there's no grinding for levels, and you don’t need to hunt for or capture monsters. Instead, every round you’ll be presented with a selection of monsters and must build the best team out of what you’ve been given.



With every monster having it’s own unique passive and movepool, you'll need to master them all if you want to be the best.



‘Necromancer For A Week’ features a unique combat system where the player is given a number of action points each turn. Every move has a unique cost, and you can also spend them switching out your active monster for the next in line.





The Yearly Necromancer tournament Has Begun!

As an ordinary groundskeeper, you're thrilled to hear you've been selected to compete. The Necromancer Council has provided you with a mentor to teach you the ways of necromancy — this is your chance to finally make something of yourself!

The tournament lasts for 7 days, and you'll need to win every round if you want to be crowned tournament champion.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 2.0+ support
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: NFAW is a roguelike where you reanimate monsters from your cemetery, choose their ideal moveset and form the best 3-monster-team you can to dominate in epic turn-based battles. Each turn you'll take multiple actions to execute the perfect strategy and dominate the necromancer tournament!
